Description

Flat Pixel is a Paris based game studio composed of artists and engineers dedicated to unique visual experiences and cutting edge technology. Specialized in augmented reality games since 2012.

History

Back history

Game Team from Arcade Games and early Augmented Reality industry with tags.

Early Creation

Game studio founded to make shmup arcade games

Jump Into second wave of AR

Make the AR Game Do Not Touch in partnership with Nickelodeon in 2017 to create the Do Not Touch app, which has since become one of the most popular AR games on the app store… and it even won Clio Award! After having created over 60 mini-games in Augmented Reality, we’ve become experts in harnessing its power to create truly fun, novel and polished AR experiences.

Back to the game

Finish our intern games projects.
